owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.validityDays: how long the signer will be valid starting from the moment of registration

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._signerManager: the address that will be authorized to add and remove signers (use address 0 to disable)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: true if the attestation is valid, reverts otherwise

params.encodedData: the EIP712-encoded struct data to be verified (32 bytes long members, hashed dynamic types)
params.signature: the signature of the hashed struct
params.typeHash: the EIP712 type hash for the struct data to be verified

returns._0: true if the signature is valid, reverts otherwise

setSignerManager(address).notice: Delegates the signer management to another address

verify((address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Verifies the given attestationAttestations contain no nonces, so it is up to the calling contract to ensure replay-safety
